firstNightReminder: The City guard chooses 2 players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
otherNightReminder: The City guard chooses 2 players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
name: City guard
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: learn if any of them is an outsider.

firstNightReminder: The Private eye chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
otherNightReminder: The Private eye chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
name: Private eye
ability: Each night*, if there were at least 2 nominations today, learn if any of the nominators woke tonight due to their ability.

firstNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
otherNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
name: Houndmaster
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn if any of their alive neighbour is a townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: The Graverobber may choose a player.
name: Graverobber
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: learn their character and gain that character's ability. If you choose a demon or alive player, you are drunk.

otherNightReminder: Show 2 character tokens.
name: Conspirator
ability: Each night, learn 2 characters which are not in the game. You might register as evil & as a demon.

otherNightReminder: If the Angler has chosen a player during the day and 3 or more players are dead, they both may die.
name: Angler
ability: Each day, you may publicly choose a player (different to last day): you and that player can't die tonight. If 3 or more players are dead, one of you might die tonight instead.

otherNightReminder: If the Shaman died tonight, show him a number.
name: Shaman
ability: Each night*, if you died today or tonight, learn how many dead players are evil.

name: Pastor
ability: If a townsfolk was executed today, no townsfolk can die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the Falconer died tonight, show thumbs up or thumbs down.
name: Falconer
ability: If you die at night, choose a player: learn if they or any of their neighbours are a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Surgeon may choose a player.
name: Surgeon
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: if they are a townsfolk, they die. Otherwise, they are resurrected.

name: Girlfriend
ability: You start knowing a good player. That player is drunk while you are alive.

otherNightReminder: The Monster choses a player.
name: Monster
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): they don't wake up tonight. You might register as dead.

otherNightReminder: The Organ donor may die and the other player may be resurrected.
name: Organ donor
ability: Each day, you may publicly ask another player what their character is. If they don't lie, you die tonight and they are resurrected.

otherNightReminder: The homeless may die.
name: Homeless
ability: Each night*, you die. Each day, if one alive player agrees, both of you are drunk until dawn.

otherNightReminder: A Mimic's victim may die tonight.
name: Mimic
ability: You start knowing a character in play. If you are not mad about being this character, they die at night.

otherNightReminder: The Acolyte may choose an alive player.
name: Acolyte
ability: If you die, choose an alive player. They become a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Zombie may be resurrected.
name: Zombie
ability: Each night*, you might be resurrected. You register as dead.

otherNightReminder: Judas may choose a player.
name: Judas
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die. If you choose a demon, he becomes good and you become a demon. Each night*, if you are a demon and no one was executed today, evil wins.

otherNightReminder: Rasputin may choose a player.
name: Rasputin
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may choose a player: they are resurrected. You keep this ability while dead.

otherNightReminder: The Cockroach might learn who the evil demons are.
name: The Cockroach
ability: You think you are an outsider, but you are not. When you die, you are woken to learn who the evil demons are. [+1 outsider]

otherNightReminder: If The Goat was nominated today, a player dies or The Goat dies.
name: The Goat
ability: The player who nominated you today dies tonight. If the demon nominated you, you die instead.

otherNightReminder: Nyrtho chooses a player.
name: Nyrtho
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Whenever another player chooses a player due to their ability, their neighbour is chosen instead.

otherNightReminder: Ghuul chooses a player.
name: Ghuul
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Each night*, you are resurrected. You register as dead. Evil loses if and only if no other evil players are alive. A minion starts knowing demon bluffs. [-1 outsider]

otherNightReminder: Camazotti chooses a player.
name: Camazotti
ability: Each night*, guess up to 3 characters and their players. Each player you get right dies. Dead players keep their abilities.

otherNightReminder: Chernobog chooses a player.
name: Chernobog
ability: A townsfolk player is a good demon, but does not know. When you die, that player learns he is a demon. Each night*, choose a player: they die. While the good demon lives, you may only choose his alive neighbours.
